name: Send Go4Clients personalized SMS to new Google Sheet Spreadsheet rows
description: When a new row is added to Google Sheets Spreadsheet, Go4Clients will send a personalized SMS to the recipient. The template uses [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y0wCp8jhPwAxxwEsD8KF6Tzxy6s7-mQdIQ5VoXrQl40/edit?usp=sharing) example spreadsheet.
